data.actual_result: The emojis show switch between the emoji and the code
data.expected_result: The emojis should be consistent, showing either only the codes or only the emojis themselves
data.short_description: Chained emoji formatting messes up when editing message
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message with multiple chained emojis (i.e. `:eyes::eyes::eyes::eyes`) - Edit the message you just sent
